title: How to Make Queen Cakes or Fairy Cakes

steps.headline: Set the oven to 190 °C (374 °F).
steps.description: Put the bun cakes in the bun tin.

steps.headline: Sift the flour into a bowl with the sugar.
steps.description: Add in the butter, eggs and pour in the vanilla.

steps.headline: Beat it all together until you have a soft creamy mixture.
Using 2 spoons, put the mixture into the bun cakes and put the tins in the oven.
Bake for 20 - 25 minutes until it is a golden colour.

tyn: Bun tin (a cupcake pan, muffin tin, whatever you call it) Oven proof coffee mugs can also be used
text: Set the oven to 190 °C (374 °F). Put the bun cakes in the bun tin. Sift the flour into a bowl with the sugar. Add in the butter, eggs and pour in the vanilla. Beat it all together until you have a soft creamy mixture.  Using 2 spoons, put the mixture into the bun cakes and put the tins in the oven.  Bake for 20 - 25 minutes until it is a golden colour.
sentences: Put the bun cakes in the bun tin.
Sift the flour into a bowl with the sugar.
Add in the butter, eggs and pour in the vanilla.
Beat it all together until you have a soft creamy mixture.
Using 2 spoons, put the mixture into the bun cakes and put the tins in the oven.
Bake for 20 - 25 minutes until it is a golden colour.
